fields.summary: Lindsay Sawyer - In our next meeting can we talk about possibl

content.text: In our next meeting can we talk about possibly re-organizing this?Journey Stage should be at the top. Journey Type, Equipment Type and number of items should all be on the same line. Priority, status, and confidence can be with Journey Stage at the top. RSM, RSM territory, Dealer, Dealer contact, as well as competition can all be on a line together or close to each other. Presentation Date, Expected close date can be together on a line (at the bottom) - for example
Browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/142.0.0.0
When the lead source is Coe Service, the RSM is suppose to select who from the service department is the referral (currently via a drop down box).
Browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/142.0.0.0
In the current journeys there is a drop down for OEM Partner
Browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/142.0.0.0
My apologies! I do see that RSM Territory is here :) ...the field that is actually missing is RSM Assist for an RSM that helps another close a deal

There should also be a drop down for "RSM Territory" this field in the current journeys is used to indicate a project that is shipping into another RSMs territory. This is essential to make sure commission pay if fair.

Because the sale cycle is so long, this needs to be adjusted too view quarter, year (probably up to 3 years). Also, Can we discuss what these numbers reflect? They look super cool, but I am thinking about, how is this a tool for the RSM?

For the Activity Log section of the CRM, include the following activity types in a dropdown: Call, Email, Meeting, Text/Chat, Quote Sent, Quote Presentation, Event, Form Submission, Website Activity, and Content Downloaded. Each activity entry should include a timestamp field that automatically defaults to the current date and time but can be manually edited to record past interactions or backdate historical activity when needed. The Activity Type should be a dropdown menu to ensure consistency in reporting, and a Sentiment dropdown should be required for every entry, with three selectable options: Negative, Neutral, and Positive. This setup ensures accurate activity tracking, proper categorization, and a quick view of customer relationship health.
